I18N.Title: There is only the root directory.
I18N.Translation: There is only the root directory.

I18N.Title: There is one file in the root directory.
I18N.Translation: Es gibt eine Datei im Hauptverzeichnis.
There is one file in the root directory.

I18N.Title: There are [FILES] files in the root directory.
I18N.Translation: There are [FILES] files in the root directory.

I18N.Title: There are [DIRS] directories, but no file.
I18N.Translation: Es gibt [DIRS] Vezeichnisse, aber nicht eine Datei.
There are [DIRS] directories, but no file.

I18N.Title: There are [DIRS] directories and one file.
I18N.Translation: Es gibt [DIRS] Verzeichnisse und eine Datei.
There are [DIRS] directories and one file.
